patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.17.0 + 22.17.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing teleport volumes in the Orokin Tower Extraction Scene.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.1 - 22.17.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed several nav issues on Orokin Derelict tileset that prevented AI from pathing properly.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Hotfix 21.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed failing the mission if you fail to complete the puzzle rooms in Void/Orokin missions before the timer runs out.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a vestigial 'Orokin' section of the Leaderboards from appearing which is already properly accounted for under 'Void'.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked the glass material on the Orokin capsules in the first mission of Vor’s Prize.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Orokin Derelict Sabotage Caches not giving any rewards.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the hitbox of the Orokin Cryopod defense target on Lua/Stöfler and Uranus/Stephano not being rotated correctly.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an incorrectly placed shadow in the Orokin Derelict tileset.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Orokin Sentries being labelled “Turret” when in a deactivated state.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Grineer Forest day/night applying night lightmap tints to the Orokin Void interior tiles.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.7
patchlogs.changes: Added LITH V2 RELIC, LITH N2 RELIC, LITH S5 RELIC, and LITH V3 RELICs to Orokin Derelict Survival rotation A and slightly increased Endo reward amount.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Replaced Orokin Cell with Gallium, and replaced Neural Sensors with Morphics as a crafting requirement in the Rhino Blueprint. This is also in the interest of using Rare Resources found on earlier planets to allow for Rhino to be crafted earlier on!

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.1
patchlogs.changes: The Orokin Derelict will no longer be selected for Alerts and Syndicate missions. This resulted in loading into the normal Derelict mission as opposed to the Alert or Syndicate mission.Missed Change:

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.3.2 + 19.3.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some Orokin and Derelict doors being inadvertently blue.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed numerous navigation issues in the Orokin Derelict and Corpus Ice Planet tileset.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U3.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed positioning of extraction trigger radius in Orokin Derelict missions.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix: Lunaro 5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed colliding/clipping with Orokin Sabotage consoles.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Sedna Junction task ‘Collect any 3 MODS from the Orokin Principle challenge rooms on LUA’ not progressing if you collect 3 of the same Mod.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Melee weapons that are lit with an Elemental FX appearing to have hard visual edges (commonly seen in dark lit environments like the Orokin Derelict).

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Orokin Labs Research shutting out all tech and not just Solar Rails (IE: you can get your Dragon Key Blueprints again).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.10.4 Operation Rathuum.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed duplicate Codex entries for the Orokin Spectator Eximus.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.5
patchlogs.fixes: More fixes for navigation issues in the Orokin Derelict tileset.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mantis Landing Craft blueprints and parts not properly dropping from rare Grineer, Corpus or Orokin loot crates.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some enemies not being able to properly jump across gaps in the Orokin Derelict tileset.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.3.1 + 18.3.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed visual FX from lasers created by Laser Defense Consoles in Orokin Void Defense Missions not properly appearing for Clients.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.1: Operation Shadow Debt.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a door frame that was missing in Orokin Survival tilesets.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed fire/ice damage related Lotus Transmissions playing on the Orokin Moon tileset.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.2.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue causing doors to flicker on Orokin Derelict tilesets, in addition to incorrect door spawning.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Drekar Heavy Gunners dropping Orokin Cells.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some script crashes related to traps in the Orokin Void.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.6 + 18.0.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Increased the size of the Void Key in Orokin Void Sabotage.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.8
patchlogs.changes: More ammo pickups have been added to the Orokin Hall of Memories Conclave map.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a mission portion of the minimap that would appear near extraction on the Orokin Derelict tileset.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.1.0
patchlogs.changes: Made slight adjustments to the trials within the Orokin Moon tileset.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a piece of pipe players could get caught on in the Orokin Moon tileset.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.4.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed rewards from Orokin Derelict Vaults not being properly received.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issues with the navigation marker when going through doors in the Orokin Void tileset.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players being forced under terrain when standing underneath the falling lighting fixture on the Orokin Moon tileset.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.7.1
patchlogs.changes: Gave Orokin Void Caches their own locker appearance as opposed to a Corpus Locker.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed various lighting issues present in the Orokin Void tilesets.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.3
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked ambience sounds in the Orokin Derelicts.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some improper electrified water visuals appearing in the Orokin Void tileset.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Crossfire Missions on Mars incorrectly labelling on faction as Orokin.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.1.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing collision on the roof of the Orokin Void tilesets.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed visual issues on Orokin-Corrupted Corpus firing animations.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Clan Log no longer showing entries after constructing the Orokin lab.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.3.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing wall textures in Cephalon Capture Orokin level.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed water in Orokin-themed Conclave maps appearing as black.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.3: The New Protocols
patchlogs.changes: Fixed various issues with AI pathing in Orokin Survival.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Lech Kril’s Sigil dropping from Orokin Vor.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.16 + Tactical Alert!
patchlogs.changes: Orokin Ducat has been renamed to Ducat.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing reverb effects in the Orokin large fountain room in Void tilesets.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Void and Orokin Derelict Missions showing up as ‘Mercury’ when viewing player activity in friends list.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.13.8
patchlogs.changes: Audio reverb applied to Orokin Derelict tilesets.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.1.2
patchlogs.changes: Removed the doppler effect from Orokin alarm sound effects.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.changes: The Raptor will now drop Neural Sensors instead of Orokin Cells.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some broken water physics that would occur in the Orokin Void tileset.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemy drones getting stuck on objects / running in circles. This should fix the common cases in Void Defense where Orokin Drones get stuck at spawn.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.10.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Corrupted Lancer’s newfound ability to shoot bullets from their face.  They now use rifles like an ordinary Orokin-influenced Grineer.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Eximus enemies that required too many scans in Codex (mostly Orokin).  Reduced scan requirement to 3.   Please note, should also fix Affinity Issues with Corrupted Eximus units.  An attempt was made to fix this in 15.2.0, but we’ve got it for real this time!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.6.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed only Nullifier Crewman and Scorching Osprey spawning after the portal is destroyed in Orokin Sabotage.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s Prism lasers not targeting Orokin Drones.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed scale issues on Orokin Explosive Barrels and Orokin Caches.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.1.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with missing Orokin Stairs as reported here: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/337776-the-ancient-mystery-of-the-missing-orokin-stairs

patchlogs.name: Update 15.7.0 Nova Prime
patchlogs.fixes: Added Orokin Ducat cost to Lex Prime Blueprint.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.8.0: Nyx Prime
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where Orokin Shield Drones would rotate onto their sides when shot by the Nukor.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.0.8
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with players potentially getting stuck under stairs on certain Orokin tilesets.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed several locked doors in the Orokin Derelicts showing up in green.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Added a 3 x Orokin Cells to TIII Survival Rewards.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed various zoning issues on the Orokin Derelict tileset.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.7.1
patchlogs.changes: Removed Vitality and other common gear from Void Vor’s drops, replaced with option of Orokin Cell or Argon Crystal AND one of four Cicero Crisis mods.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.8.0: Breeding Grounds
patchlogs.changes: Increased the number of Orokin Cells received as T3 Survival awards from 1 to 3 per batch.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Orokin Shield drones breaking when affected by Radial Disarm.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Archwing
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked Orokin Derelict Defense:

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.1.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with certain forms of damage not properly destroying Orokin Traps.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
patchlogs.changes: Optimized a number of light assets in the Orokin Void tileset.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Edit Panel message not being displayed correctly above panels in the Observatory or Orokin Lab Dojo rooms.

patchlogs.name: Update 14: The Mad Cephalon
patchlogs.changes: Made curved walls larger to better support wall runs in the Orokin Void.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed lighting issues in Orokin Void.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 10.3.3 + 10.3.4
patchlogs.changes: Added a profile setting to enable/disable runtime tessellation for DirectX 11. We encourage players to give us feedback whether disabling this option results in performance improvement on mid-to-low-end video cards when playing Orokin Derelicts.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.3.0: Hump Day!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue where after activating the first objective in Orokin mobile defense, the timer does not start.
patchlogs.additions: The Orokin Vaults have emerged in the Derelict Tile Sets! https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/117801-the-orokin-vaults-have-emerged/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Orokin laser trap cooldown UI timer not showing on clients.

name: Lotus
description:
A set of colors inspired by the Lotus.
Unlocks additional color options for Warframe customization.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Zephyr Prime 22.16.4
patchlogs.changes: Reduced Lotus transmission frequency in Survival missions.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.20.0
patchlogs.changes: Lotus is less chatty in Fissure missions!

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.10.3
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the time between Bounty stages from 8 seconds to 4 seconds so you’re not waiting around for Lotus to tell you where to go next.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.2.5
patchlogs.changes: Removed Lotus transmission from End of Mission screen when going from Plains back to Cetus when you haven't done anything.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.1.1
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the frequency of Incursion missions occurring if you ignore them. When an Incursion mission is available, a ping sound will play, and the Lotus' transmission will play only if you engage it.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed default Lotus Symbol avatar appearing for last player to join a squad.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.6.0 + Hotfix 22.6.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Updated one of Lotus’ lines for the Mastery Rank 25 test to better match the test.Plains Of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.6.0.1:

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Operator being able to use Void abilities (without any FX) while Lotus is speaking during The War Within.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Lotus saying her "now kill everything that moves" line when she shouldn't in Sabotage Sorties.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Lotus congratulating you on your un-true Grand Master status as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/776630-lotus-thanks-me-for-being-a-grand-master-when-im-not/

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Lotus playing her ‘out of bounds’ extraction VO during every esophage warp in The Jordas Verdict.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.changes: Removed Lotus’ “Job well done” VO at the end of the Second Dream missions.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.11.0+19.11.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Lotus transmissions playing when spawning Lynx in the Simulacrum.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.3.1
patchlogs.additions: Added Lotus tutorial transmissions to Spy missions, Survival missions, and Void Fissure missions. Fun fact: there is an option in your in-game Audio settings titled ‘Enable Hint Transmissions’ (previously was ‘Enable Tutorial Transmission’). Enabling this will give you those Lotus ‘help’ transmissions that play throughout the mission, and disabling it prevents them from playing.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect Lotus transmissions during a Kuva Siphon.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Update 1
patchlogs.changes: The Lotus will now inform you of your location to the Shrine when finding it outside of The Silver Grove quest.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
patchlogs.changes: Increased the brightness of the Guides of The Lotus Sigil.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix: Lunaro 6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Lotus transmissions warning you of an approaching Prosecutor.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Mantle of the Lotus Shoulder Armor (GOTL) visual effects not appearing properly on channeled melee weapons.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Lotus Transmissions not matching her VO after hacking a terminal to reset security sensors.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed fire/ice damage related Lotus Transmissions playing on the Orokin Moon tileset.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error causing the Lotus’ Invasion announcement VO to play continuously when an Infestation Outbreak spreads to other nodes.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Lotus not properly communicating with players in Grineer vs Corpus Invasions as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/428824-lotus-mute-in-grineer-vs-corpus-invasions-since-16/

patchlogs.name: Update 17.11.0 + 17.11.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Lotus’ VO not playing in Grineer vs Corpus Invasions.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Lotus sending players transmissions about ‘incoming walkers’ in Archwing Missions.  Oh, that wacky Lotus!

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Lotus playing repetitive Transmission VO during Invasion Missions.
patchlogs.additions: Lotus VO has been added to inform players when a fellow Tenno is downed and in need of Reviving!

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.1+19.12.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some cosmetic previews in loadout not showing the correct cosmetic (ie. Lotus fur pattern for Kubrows when it's the natural one).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a typo in the Lotus’ dialogue in the opening Tutorial Quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Lotus’ Transmission not playing after Tyl Regor is defeated.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed decorative Lotus symbols on challenge icons spinning sideways.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: The Lotus (in Transmissions) has been given the PBR treatment.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Lotus occasionally broadcasting transmissions about the Infested on non-Infested Survival Missions.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.7
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the amount of Lotus transmissions that occur during Spy Missions.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.16 + Tactical Alert!
patchlogs.changes: Crossfire Missions now have unique Lotus Transmissions.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.changes: Syndicates no longer require multiple sacrifices if players drop from a higher tier to a lower one.  Players will only need to make one sacrifice ever when moving between tiers.A Note From The Lotus:
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the dialogue between Lotus and Maroo at the final mission of Stolen Dreams being out of order.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.16.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed broken Lotus transmission subtitle that would occur in Crossfire missions.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.11
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed host migration triggering a replay of Lotus’ broadcasted Mission alerts.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.3
patchlogs.changes: Reduced frequency of Lotus transmission notifications.  Lotus will now remind players about unstarted quests once every three days.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Kubrow quest - Only play Lotus "you need to find an egg" transmission after Incubator install, not on every retry attempt. Fix for Lotus "you found an egg" transmission never playing.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.0.8
patchlogs.changes: Corrected a couple of incorrect references in numerous Lotus transmissions.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.5.0: Edo Armor & Nami Solo
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with incorrect Lotus Voice Overs playing during Dark Sector Conflicts.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing text during Lotus transmission after player cancels a dual in a Dojo.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.1.0: Amprex

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.changes: Excluded Reactant and Index Point pickups from Simulor, Inaros' Sandstorm, Zephyr Tornado, and Vauban's Vortex. This also fixes the exception lists for the Simulor; it wasn't supposed to be moving  gameplay objects (eg Datamass, Excavation Power Cells, Raptor Cells, etc) but it generally wasn't of a problem because the objects were heavy enough (properly excluding them should run faster too!). As more and more gameplay components rely on pickups, we've addressed this issue as it is commonly discussed by you all.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.12: Saryn Prime
patchlogs.changes: Infested Sorties will no longer generate Hijack Sortie Missions because their tiny baby claws are too small to reach the core.Convergence will always spawn moving towards an objective to help reduce unnecessary backtracking.Gravity has been disabled for Convergence pickups, keeping their appearance predictable..Steel Meridian’s General Sacrifice has been changed from Rhino Prime Helmet to Trinity Prime Helmet.The Rift and its interaction with hacking terminals has now been consistently applied to be not-hackable. You may have noticed the inconsistency in Rifted targets ability to interact with hacking panels. While his Rift-based skillset does offer some unique opportunities for players one major issue discussed within the community has been determining what are the 'rules' Limbo's Riftwalking follows. Keeping this in mind players can expect future updates to contain adjustments to Limbo, enemies, and interactable elements of the environment, to help make playing Limbo a more consistent experience.  We will continue to monitor Limbo's unique interactive mechanic and its effect on gameplay, and will let you know should any other changes be necessary. Stay tuned for a Dev Workshop!

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted the blocking volumes on elevators on the Corpus Ice Planet Tileset to prevent players from being able to accidentally exit the level.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a map hole found in the Corpus Ice Planet tileset.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.12: Saryn Prime
patchlogs.changes: Infested Sorties will no longer generate Hijack Sortie Missions because their tiny baby claws are too small to reach the core.Convergence will always spawn moving towards an objective to help reduce unnecessary backtracking.Gravity has been disabled for Convergence pickups, keeping their appearance predictable..Steel Meridian’s General Sacrifice has been changed from Rhino Prime Helmet to Trinity Prime Helmet.The Rift and its interaction with hacking terminals has now been consistently applied to be not-hackable. You may have noticed the inconsistency in Rifted targets ability to interact with hacking panels. While his Rift-based skillset does offer some unique opportunities for players one major issue discussed within the community has been determining what are the 'rules' Limbo's Riftwalking follows. Keeping this in mind players can expect future updates to contain adjustments to Limbo, enemies, and interactable elements of the environment, to help make playing Limbo a more consistent experience.  We will continue to monitor Limbo's unique interactive mechanic and its effect on gameplay, and will let you know should any other changes be necessary. Stay tuned for a Dev Workshop!

patchlogs.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
patchlogs.changes: Projectiles spawned by an ability will be deflected when they encounter a Nullifier bubble. For example, Ember’s Fireball and Ash’s Shuriken will be deflected.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.13.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Adhesive Blast not causing the Javlok explosion to stick and pause for a while (through primary fire).

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 12
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Crossfire mission on Mars - Augustus being Grineer vs Grineer.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nekros’ Hyekka Master clones damaging allies with her fire grenade as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/714188-nekross-shadow-hyekka-master-burns-other-shadows/

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a few problems that would occur from using a Riven with Fire-Rate worse than -100%.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.6.3
patchlogs.changes: The Sybaris Prime has had it's hip-fire / aim-fire recoil reviewed to have less side-to-side movement.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue that allowed players to fire guns faster than intended when repeatedly meleeing in the air.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue causing crouch, slide and other hip fire animation poses to quickly switch sides when firing.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.1.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some weapon audio FX not properly playing when fired.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Conclave Mods Blind Shot and Lucky Shot being able to be slotted into weapons that do not fire projectiles.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.10.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ember's Fireblast, Vauban's Vortex and Volt's Electric Shield Abilities being cancelled when you enter a Nullifier Bubble.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue enabling players to mantle recently fired Ogris rockets.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.3.1 + 18.3.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an improper fire visual FX that would appear on the Ignis in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Update 19.12.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the primary fire damage of the Javlok in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.1: Operation Shadow Debt.
patchlogs.changes: Fixed environmental fire affecting Limbo while he (or Banished allies) are in the  Rift.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed fire/ice damage related Lotus Transmissions playing on the Orokin Moon tileset.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.7
patchlogs.changes: Slightly adjusted Ivara’s Artemis Bow’s fire and draw audio FX.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Fatal Attraction issue that could allow mesmerized enemies to fire at you

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when casting Ember’s Fireball ability.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.7.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the firing sounds of the Redeemer and Sarpa when fired by other players.
patchlogs.fixes: Fix the AoE from Nightwatch Napalm Mod doing self-damage when fired during Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors as per:

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error providing players with 0 energy drain when using Ember’s World on Fire or Chroma’s Effigy if they fell off the level into a pit, etc.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ember’s World on Fire explosive impacts not properly displaying.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.7
patchlogs.changes: Made some adjustments to Ember’s World on Fire audio FX.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed punch-through Mods disabling the Harpak and Paracyst’s alt-fire.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the collision box of excavators in Excavation Missions unintentionally blocking player fire.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Vulklok not properly receiving adjustments to magazine size, fire-rate and reload time via Mods.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.4.3
patchlogs.changes: Fire rate mods now reduce time between shots per burst on burst fire weapons.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Arsenal UI not displaying the proper fire rate for burst weapons.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.11.0 + 17.11.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted the stats breakdown of Ember’s Fire Blast ability to show the DPS and Explosion damage separately.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ember’s World on Fire not playing a sound FX on cast.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Stug primary fire shooting continuously and not using ammo.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Atlas being able to fire weapons while punching during Landslide.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Simulor creating too many explosions when used with Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors and fire rate Mods.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where throwing the Glaive would put players into a free fire mode.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.10 & Tactial Alert: Divine Will
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an extended delay that occurs with the Ogris when attempting to fire the weapon after cancelling a charged shot.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.10.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed charged beams from the Opticor not aiming properly when fired by Mirage’s clones.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Clients using the Harpak experiencing firing delays that would prevent use of the alt fire.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ember’s Fireball Frenzy Augment causing Fireballs to bounce off of Mesa’s Shatter Shield.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.10.0
patchlogs.changes: The Braton Vandal has received additional tweaks to its audio FX when fired.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Crossfire Missions on Mars incorrectly labelling on faction as Orokin.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue causing Atomos particle effects to hover in mid-air after being fired as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/463128-floating-atomos-beams/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.1.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a small loading issue that would occur when Lieutenant Lech Kril changes fire modes.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Lanka’s fire rate not properly updating with fire rate Mods.
patchlogs.additions: Added a ‘Charge Rate’ stat to the Arsenal for charge based weapons (bows, etc). You now have a number to associate your weapon Charge rate with - it will show how it is affected by the Fire Rate mods that you have equipped!

patchlogs.name: Update 16.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed punch-through Mods sometimes not having a proper effect on weapon’s fire.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed fire rate Mods not allowing charge weapons like the Ogris or Opticor to fire.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Strun not being able to be reloaded until all shells are fired when using reload speed Mods.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the range and damage of Ember’s World on Fire in PvP.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ember’s Fire Blast killing other players after she’s left the match as a Client.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.1: Volt Prime
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Frost’s Icicle and Ember’s Fireball auto-targeting the enemy’s torso when aiming manually at a target.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.16 + Tactical Alert!
patchlogs.changes: Crossfire Missions now have unique Lotus Transmissions.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Panthera’s alt fire being able to damage squad mates.
patchlogs.additions: Added audio details to Arsenal -- weapons should now display their loudness to help better distinguish between Silent or Alarming weapons fire.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.11.1
patchlogs.changes: Updated visual effects on Ember’s casting animations.  Ember should now be a little brighter when summoning fire. Please note we are still reviewing the changes overall!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error that was causing a ‘check your firewall settings’ warning to be broadcasted.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.14.1
patchlogs.changes: Syndicate Allies will hold fire while players are doing stealth kills.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.13.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed single-shot weapons not having the appropriate default rate of fire.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.10.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced fire rate of Kohm in full auto, but boosted projectile damage to compensate.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Ember’s Fireball Frenzy Augment Mod remaining on a player when cast twice on a player before the first cast expired.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.5
patchlogs.changes: Added improved visual FX to the Firewalker Mod.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.13.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue causing Syndicate Missions to behave like normal Crossfire Missions, in addition to featuring no Medallions.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed error that would allow Punch Through Mods to create unlimited multishot when a weapon is fired through Volt’s Electric Shield.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.16.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed broken Lotus transmission subtitle that would occur in Crossfire missions.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Velocitus weapon fire sound ending prematurely, also corrected various weapon fire animations.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.5
patchlogs.changes: Weapons that have secondary fire abilities can no longer use their primary fire while the secondary is active. This fix affects weapons that require the secondary fire button to be held down.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed weapons with fire rate below 1 not accurately displaying stat changes when Mods are applied.

patchlogs.name: Mesa Update
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ember’s Fire Blast only damaging targets once, rather than causing damage over time.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Panthera’s alternate fire causing the razor blade to fly backwards when pressed rapidly.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.10.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue where alternate fire modes on the Panthera didn't visually work properly for clients.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.1
patchlogs.changes: Added new hip fire poses to the Gammacor.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.1.0+15.1.01
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Burst weapons fire rate being frame-rate dependent (Semi-automatic weapon fix to come!).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.1.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Ballistica where it would only burst fire on the first attempt. After that the "tap fire" would only shoot once.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.7+15.5.7.1
patchlogs.changes: Increased Fire Rate

patchlogs.name: Update 15.7.0 Nova Prime
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed friendly fire damaging Sentinel’s Sanctuary shield.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed cases of Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors Friendly Fire caused by temporary radiation induced faction change.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.8
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Gammacor’s laser not appearing when fired.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.1.2 + 14.1.2.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with the Quanta’s Alt Fire projectile not blowing up correctly for clients.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted the Kohm to shoot a maximum of 5 pellets, in addition to dropping the fire rate but boosting projectile damage to compensate for dps.  This should keep the Kohm’s damage relatively unchanged, while helping cut down on the graphical latency caused by the weapon.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ember’s Fire Blast applying a push velocity while player was blocking.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed weapon charge amount not resetting when the weapon is ready to refire/charge.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
patchlogs.changes: Ember’s Fire Blast
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue Lech Kril bypassing his Fire Phase and remaining in the Ice Phase for the duration of the fight

patchlogs.name: Update 14: The Mad Cephalon
patchlogs.changes: Limited the instances of Corpus Laser Weapon fire sound effects.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue with Mutalist Quanta dealing friendly fire damage.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.2.0: Avalanche Offensive

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 10.5.3
patchlogs.changes: Toned down sound FX for ambient laser fire during invasion missions

patchlogs.name: Update 11: Valkyr Unleashed
patchlogs.changes: Fixed issue that allowed spectators to fire the Ignis and Flux rifle while spectating in Conclave

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 9.4: Double Affinity Weekend!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed continuous fire weapons not swapping out until you stop sprinting.

patchlogs.name: Update 9.7
patchlogs.changes: Miter – increased fire rate, higher charge damage. Charged shots fire through targets.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ember’s Overheat ability that was creating extra fire FX on clients.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.3.0: Hump Day!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ember’s Fireblast light FX being independent of its power duration.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ember’s World on Fire ability from targeting inactive turrets.

name: Eximus
description:
A set of colors derived from the uniforms of Eximus adversaries.
Unlocks additional color options for Warframe customization.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Tusk Minigun Bombard Eximus and Tusk Sniper Eximus not reacting properly to being disarmed in Cetus.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the elusive invulnerable enemy bug as per:Thank you everyone for contributing to this thread! The issue was caused by enemies entering 'safe zones' like Eximus snowglobes or Nullifier shields, then having those zones destroyed.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Eximus units can now be summoned as Inaros’ Sand Shadows.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.6.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Hek Drone sometimes arriving as an Eximus unit, but also as a Corpus attack drone in The Law of Retribution.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Cephalon Suda's death squads not being Eximus units. Look out!

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Arctic Eximus Snow Globe blocking explosion damage that they should not be blocking (and not blocking it when it should have). The barrier should now be closer to the visual representation.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Scorpion Eximus having an odd texture on her face.

patchlogs.name: Recurring Nightmares
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Railgun and Shockwave Moa Eximus flickering in their Codex diorama.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Codex drop sources not distinguishing Eximus units.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed when fighting an Arctic Eximus, the enemy inside the bubble wouldn't take damage from any gun or melee until the bubble outside was popped.

patchlogs.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the problem where low-level Interception missions were flooded with Eximus’.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 11
patchlogs.changes: All Archwing Eximus now require 3 scans to complete the Codex entry (same scan count as land based Eximus units).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.10.4 Operation Rathuum.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed duplicate Codex entries for the Orokin Spectator Eximus.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Penta and Quanta Ranger Eximus’ merging into one another when viewed in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed broken Eximus variations for Corrupted Butcher, Heavy Gunner and Drakar Heavy Gunner preventing them from ever spawning.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed having two entries for Grineer Warden and Grineer Warden Eximus in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.3.1 + 18.3.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Eximus units having unusual damage resistance as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/570556-u18-game-breaking-bug-invulnerable-eximus/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a Atlas’ Petrify having an unusual effect on the Eximus ice shield as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/539173-atlas-petrify-visual-bug-on-artic-eximus/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Eximus Stronghold Sorties not properly spawning Eximus enemies.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemy Eximus Toxic auras proccing on players when the enemy is under the effect of mind control as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/395695-ability-exception-nyx-mind-control-on-ancient-corrupt-eximus/

patchlogs.name: Update 15.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Eximus enemies that required too many scans in Codex (mostly Orokin).  Reduced scan requirement to 3.   Please note, should also fix Affinity Issues with Corrupted Eximus units.  An attempt was made to fix this in 15.2.0, but we’ve got it for real this time!

patchlogs.name: Update 15.1.0+15.1.01
patchlogs.changes: Increased the health of Syndicate Eximus teams.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issues with Eximus Corpus Elites not having proper materials.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.7.0 + 13.7.0.1: Depths Of The Void
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being unable to scan the Arid Butcher Eximus correctly.

name: Easter
description: Unlocks a collection of lovely EASTER colors.

name: Tenno
description: Unlocks additional color options reflecting the default colors used on each standard Warframe.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.4
patchlogs.changes: Kuva Guardians will now play their disarming animation properly, instead of having their Twin Rogga’s magically pop into their hands.We’Re Working On A Script To Give The Respective Shoulder Armor To Those Who Purchased The Tennogen Skin. We Will Update You Here When It Is Running/Complete. Script Has Been Run And Has Completed! Please Relog If You Purchased The Banshee Sonority Skin Pre-Hotfix.:

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.7
patchlogs.changes: Quill Onkko has added a Cetus Wisp to his Offerings in Cetus. These can be purchased with Quill Standing for Architect level Tenno.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.20.0
patchlogs.changes: Updated chat profanity filter to catch profanity with punctuation immediately following it. Those of you who live on the edge and have the filter turned off won’t notice a thing, but there might be a few more asterisks and a few less inappropriate words in chat for our filtered Tenno.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed seeing numerous of the same TennoGen Syandana displayed as a filepath. Attempting to purchase this would result in an error.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.16.0
patchlogs.changes: TennoGen items are now linkable in chat!

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.13.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Tennogen Liset Skins showing a Credit icon instead of Steam icon.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.4
patchlogs.changes: *We Are Aware Of An Issue Where You Appear To Be Able To Gift The Harrow Graxx Tennogen Skin In The Market. Upon Selecting This It Will Fail And Not Charge You The Respective Platinum. We’Re Working On Removing The Unintended Option For Our Next Hotfix/Update.:

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed color customization for Tenno Markings affecting Accessories as well.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.6.0 + Hotfix 22.6.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Tuned down the bloom on the wings of the Chroma Vojnik Battle-Damaged Tennogen Skin.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.1.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the material of Valkyr’s Delusion Tennogen Skin incorrectly applying when toggling on the Prime details for Valkyr Prime in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Changed the TennoGen Knaita Mag skin’s default colors to match the Steam Workshop’s main image. Icons for Helmet and Skin have been updated to match as well.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the TennoGen icon appearing the wrong color in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed TennoGen Covenant Syandana occasionally bending oddly with various Stances.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.6.2
patchlogs.changes: Volt’s armor can now be used on Volt Prime so TennoGen Skins can look as intended.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the “Gift” option appearing on certain TennoGen skins when they are unable to be gifted.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed numerous TennoGen Syandanas clipping through Warframes.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.1
patchlogs.changes: Improved resolution textures on all the TennoGen Round 7 Helmet and Skins.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.11.0+19.11.0.1
patchlogs.changes: There is now a ‘Toggle Prime Details’ toggle for TennoGen skins once applied to a Prime Warframe. This allows you to choose between the Prime Warframe mesh or the Default Warframe mesh!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the TennoGen Infested Skana skin not applying properly to the Prisma Skana.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.4.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed numerous TennoGen items that did not have localized description text.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.6+19.5.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Unlimited gifting has been reverted back to it’s original limit in conclusion of Tennobaum! Thanks for your honorable, giving spirit, Tenno. You’ve spread great happiness throughout the Warframe community and to children and their families beyond. We couldn’t be more proud!

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.6.0 + 19.6.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Changed ‘Tenno’ to ‘allies’ in the Cat’s Eye Mod description.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U1.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a texture issue with the TennoGen Excalibur Caduto skin.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed inconsistent texture on the Officium TennoGen Syandana.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a significant amount of missing Codex Mods thanks to the helpful Tenno here https://forums.warframe.com/topic/175141-list-of-codex-bugs/?page=14#comment-7954000

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 2
patchlogs.changes: Updated numerous Hitsu San TennoGen item textures.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U1.2 + U1.3
patchlogs.changes: Changed the description of the TennoGen Excalibur Graxx helmet and skin to better clarify what items you receive.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
patchlogs.changes: Updated the TennoGen Rota Syandana materials.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some TennoGen items having a giftable option in the Market. Upon selecting this it would fail and not charge you the respective Platinum.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.12.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash that could occur when purchasing TennoGen items through Steam.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.4.4
patchlogs.changes: Darvo will more readily chat with Tenno in a busy Relay.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players being unable to change colors of their Sigils after equipping the Community of Tenno Sigil.
patchlogs.additions: Lotus VO has been added to inform players when a fellow Tenno is downed and in need of Reviving!

patchlogs.name: Update 17.1.0 - 17.1.4
patchlogs.changes: Tenno Reinforcements:

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Tipedo not having Tenno script on it as intended.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.7.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Grineer Toxin Injector appearing under ‘Tenno’ in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.16.2
patchlogs.changes: Tenno can now buy Forma directly from upgrade screen

patchlogs.name: Update 15.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the reload sound of Phage never ending if the animation is interrupted with a Tenno power.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.15 + 15.15.01
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Tonbo not appearing in Tenno Research Lab.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.6.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue where changing loadout in a Relay Station gives Tenno back their powers.  Relays are a no power zone!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.6
patchlogs.changes: Consumables and Gear will no longer be usable when in the ‘Tenno Hub’. Coming later.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.5
patchlogs.changes: Updated artwork and backdrop in Tenno Hub Hangar.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mesa’s Peacemaker, Nyx’s Psychic Bolts, and Limbo’s Cataclysm affecting enemies that are immune to Tenno abilities.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.12.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the bloom values in the Dojo Tenno Lab.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Tenno Lab not appearing on the minimap of the Clan Dojo.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.1.4
patchlogs.changes: Bleed out timers will now be displayed as Health when playing in Dark Sectors, allowing for enemy Tenno to be killed once they're downed.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.8
patchlogs.changes: Fixed issue where using a Thrown weapon when on a ledge would cause Tenno to step off the ledge.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Void Mobile Defense maps have been reduced in size to cut down on the amount of travel Tenno need to do.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Captain Vor standing still and doing nothing during third phase of fight.  Will now properly shoot at Tenno skoom.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
patchlogs.changes: Corrected Tenno Default Colour Picker to use proper Gamma colour values.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.1.0: Amprex
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Rhino Tenno Specter's Rhino Charge dealing no damage.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.2.0: Avalanche Offensive
patchlogs.fixes: Update 14.2.0: Avalanche Offensive Psa: The Launcher May Require You To Enter Your Windows Administrator Password To Update Your Firewall Rules.Avalanche Offensive Is On Until Monday @ 12 Noon Edt! Avalanche Offensivedefeat The Corpus Arctic Eximus!A Message From Cantis Of The Red Veil Resistance:Here'S What You'Ll Need To Dogo Forth And Take Down The Corpus Arctic Eximus, Tenno!Additions:Weapon Balance Changes:     • Grakata    • Castanas    • Ogris    • Torid    • Penta    • Lanka    • Vectis    • Vulkar    • Angstrum:    • Acrid:    • Attica:    • Spectra & Flux Rifle:    • Snipetron (+Vandal):    • Torid Changes:    • All Launchers:Key Hosting Improvements:Changes:Fixes:

patchlogs.name: Update 11.7.0 + 11.7.1
patchlogs.changes: Tenno Reinforcements:

patchlogs.name: Update 6: Hotfix 6.2
patchlogs.changes: Tenno Reinforcements: Weapons Added!:

name: Daybreak
description: Rise up with these additional color options for Warframe customization.

name: Bastille
description: Unlocks a collection of symbolic colors, found in datamass detailing the record of an ancient battle.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Vauban’s Bastille and Vortex lingering in tiles after players have left said tile.This resulted in enemies continually being damaged or immobile even after the ability ended.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Vauban’s Bastille FX remaining indefinitely upon Host migration.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.10 & Tactial Alert: Divine Will
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error causing Vauban’s Bastille to continue indefinitely if the ability was active before Vauban revived.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nullifier auras from drones in the Law of Retribution Nightmare Trial not properly breaking lingering Warframe CC abilities such as Bastille.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Bastille not working on neutral enemies such as the Kubrow or Sand Skate.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.1.0+15.1.01
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issues with Crewman in Bastille not being affected by headshots with the Opticor (https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/335385-opticor-bastille-vs-corpus-cant-headshot/)

patchlogs.name: Update 14.9.0
patchlogs.changes: Improved performance on the visual effects of Vauban’s Bastille for longer durations in an effort to reduce crashes.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.8.0: Nyx Prime
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Vauban's Bastille slowly deteriorating frame-rate each time it was cast. Thanks to Test Clan Please Ignore for helping isolate the problem.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.0.8
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with not being able to properly shoot Ancient Infested enemies trapped in Bastille containment fields.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed several Corpus Crewmen  not having ability reaction anims (e.g. levitate for Bastille).

patchlogs.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
patchlogs.changes: Vauban’s Bastille

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 9.4: Double Affinity Weekend!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed bad cases with Tesla, Bounce, and Bastille that would occur when the instigator player would die/respawn/leave the game.

patchlogs.name: Update 9.5: Operation Arid Fear
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed bad cases with Vauban’s Tesla, Bounce, and Bastille that would occur when the instigator player would die/respawn/leave the game.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.12: Saryn Prime
patchlogs.changes: Infested Sorties will no longer generate Hijack Sortie Missions because their tiny baby claws are too small to reach the core.Convergence will always spawn moving towards an objective to help reduce unnecessary backtracking.Gravity has been disabled for Convergence pickups, keeping their appearance predictable..Steel Meridian’s General Sacrifice has been changed from Rhino Prime Helmet to Trinity Prime Helmet.The Rift and its interaction with hacking terminals has now been consistently applied to be not-hackable. You may have noticed the inconsistency in Rifted targets ability to interact with hacking panels. While his Rift-based skillset does offer some unique opportunities for players one major issue discussed within the community has been determining what are the 'rules' Limbo's Riftwalking follows. Keeping this in mind players can expect future updates to contain adjustments to Limbo, enemies, and interactable elements of the environment, to help make playing Limbo a more consistent experience.  We will continue to monitor Limbo's unique interactive mechanic and its effect on gameplay, and will let you know should any other changes be necessary. Stay tuned for a Dev Workshop!
